page.title: 10SUPERNATURAL
page.content:
{The Horse and Cart} At twelve o'clock on moonlit nights a horse and coach is said to have been heard rushing past the Wheel Inn at Cross Lanes.
At first a quiet,distant rumbling is heard.This gradually gets louder and louder until the crashing of the horse's feet becomes deafening.The creaking of the wheels and the clanging of metal rims on stone vibrates through the air.The cracking of the driver's whip on the horse's back cuts the still night air.
Some people have rushed out of the pub to see it but it was nowhere to be seen!!!!
